name: Loot Box Simulator
description: A satirical look at the current trajectory of the game industry. Open loot boxes, collect loot, equip cosmetics, face off against the dark lord, watch ads, take surveys, and slowly succumb to addiction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
